name: locallyjs
description: Locally is a localStorage manager that supports expirable values with TTL and saves space by compressing them using LZW algorithm.
author: Ozan Tunca <ozan@ozantunca.org> (http://www.ozantunca.org/)

scripts.test: mocha test/node-mocha.js; mocha test/node-mocha.js; --dist; mocha test/node-mocha.js --distmin;
scripts.build: cp src/locally.js dist/locally.js; browserify src/locally.js -t babelify -t uglifyify -o dist/locally.min.js -s 'locallyjs';
